mapper.select: SELECT PGPID.GOV_PUBLS_ITM_NM AS GOV_PUBLS_ITM_NM /*정부고시항목명*/ ,PGPPD.GOV_PUBLS_ITM_CNTNT AS GOV_PUBLS_ITM_CNTNT /*정부고시항목내용*/ FROM PRD_GOV_PUBLS_PRD_D PGPPD ,PRD_GOV_PUBLS_ITM_D PGPID WHERE PGPPD.GOV_PUBLS_ITM_CD = PGPID.GOV_PUBLS_ITM_CD AND PGPPD.GOV_PUBLS_PRD_GRP_CD = PGPID.GOV_PUBLS_PRD_GRP_CD AND PGPPD.PRD_CD = #{productCode} /*상품코드*/ AND PGPPD.EXPOS_YN = 'Y' /*노출여부*/ AND PGPID.EXPOS_YN = 'Y' /*노출여부*/ ORDER BY PGPPD.EXPOS_SEQ /*노출순서*/
